value.description: Coleman was wanted for a probation violation out of Danville, VA. He had barricaded himself in his residence and was armed with a handgun.

value.name: David Scott
value.description: David Scott, 49, passed away May 9, 2021 in Huntsville, Alabama. Born November 11, 1971, Mr. Scott resided in Huntsville. The funeral will be held May 22, 2021 at 3 p.m. at Jonas Lobe Cemetery with Pastor Jimmy Thomas officiating.

value.name: David Scott Joins Meadows Bank as Regional President in Arizona
value.description: Meadows Bank announced today that David Scott has joined Meadows Bank as the Regional President in Arizona. David brings 18 years of commercial banking experience to his role overseeing the expansion of Meadows Bank’s commercial banking operations in the state.

value.description: Sectarianism refers to loyalty to a group (usually political or religious), but those living in the UK may know the term to refer to the violence and abuse that exists between Protestants and catholics.
